amendment.description: To preserve and protect the free choice of individual employees to form, join, or assist labor organizations, or to refrain from such activities.
amendment.purpose: To preserve and protect the free choice of individual employees to form, join, or assist labor organizations, or to refrain from such activities.

action.text: Amendment SA 31 proposed by Senator DeMint.

vote.text: Motion to table amendment SA 31 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 31. Record Vote Number: 11.
